lead_paragraph: Gloria Fields, 31, was also charged with crimes including assault and sexual abuse against Anthony Delgado, who was 16 months old.

headline.main: Babysitter Accused of Killing Staten Island Boy

snippet: Gloria Fields, 31, was also charged with crimes including assault and sexual abuse against Anthony Delgado, who was 16 months old.
abstract: Gloria Fields is charged with second-degree murder, assault and aggravated sexual assault in death of 16-month-old Anthony Delgado, child she was babysitting on Staten Island; medical examiner's office determined boy died from blunt force injuries to his head and torso.
